SEARCH
Package io.github.epadronu.dwalin.visual

Class ImageComparisonHelper.Builder

java.lang.Object
io.github.epadronu.dwalin.visual.ImageComparisonHelper.Builder
Enclosing class:
ImageComparisonHelper
public static final class ImageComparisonHelper.Builder extends Object
Builder class for constructing instances of ImageComparisonHelper.

The Builder class provides a fluent API for configuring and creating instances of ImageComparisonHelper. It allows setting various parameters, such as the image comparison configuration context, the report attachment mode, and how to handle size mismatches between images.

Example usage: 


 final ImageComparisonHelper helper = ImageComparisonHelper.builder()
     .imageComparisonConfigurationContext(config -> config.setThreshold(0.1))
     .reportAttachmentMode(ReportAttachmentMode.EXPECTED | ReportAttachmentMode.ACTUAL)
     .sizeMismatchHandlingMode(SizeMismatchHandlingMode.CUT_AND_FIT)
     .build();

    • build

      public ImageComparisonHelper build()
      Constructs and returns a new ImageComparisonHelper instance based on the current configuration of the ImageComparisonHelper.Builder.

      This method finalizes the configuration and creates an ImageComparisonHelper object that can be used to perform image comparisons according to the specified settings.

      Returns:
      a new ImageComparisonHelper instance configured with the parameters set in the ImageComparisonHelper.Builder.
